2858.verse: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ|Yet they have taken|157|163|10857$مِن دُونِهِۦٓ|besides Him|116|128|4463$ءَالِهَةً|gods|72|84|5479$لَّا|not|42|54|30$يَخْلُقُونَ|they create|98|110|9920$شَيْــًٔا|anything,|82|94|472$وَهُمْ|while they|88|94|256$يُخْلَقُونَ|are created,|102|108|7077$وَلَا|and not|71|84|25$يَمْلِكُونَ|they possess|107|120|9394$لِأَنفُسِهِمْ|for themselves|117|130|9395$ضَرًّا|any harm|81|94|5166$وَلَا|and not|71|84|25$نَفْعًا|any benefit,|100|106|3761$وَلَا|and not|71|82|25$يَمْلِكُونَ|they control|101|124|9394$مَوْتًا|death|62|85|12700$وَلَا|and not|71|94|25$حَيَوٲةً|life|68|91|10140$وَلَا|and not|71|94|25$نُشُورًا|resurrection.|104|115|12701$

2860.verse: وَقَالُوٓاْ|And they say,|113|124|760$أَسَـٰطِيرُ|"Tales|94|115|5506$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|(of) the former people|167|188|5507$ٱكْتَتَبَهَا|which he has had written|188|209|12705$فَهِىَ|and they|79|90|709$تُمْلَىٰ|are dictated|101|158|12706$عَلَيْهِ|to him|64|177|395$بُكْرَةً|morning|71|184|11101$وَأَصِيلاً|and evening."|110|166|12707$

2861.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|60|765$أَنزَلَهُ|"Has sent it down|137|157|12708$ٱلَّذِى|the One Who|107|127|138$يَعْلَمُ|knows|61|81|742$ٱلسِّرَّ|the secret|89|109|11344$فِى|in|48|68|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|125|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۚ|and the earth.|116|140|352$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|140|396$كَانَ|is|57|104|913$غَفُورًا|Oft-Forgiving,|112|160|3883$رَّحِيمًا|Most Merciful."|118|142|3814$

2864.verse: ٱنظُرْ|See|70|79|4068$كَيْفَ|how|66|83|288$ضَرَبُواْ|they set forth|113|130|3423$لَكَ|for you|67|84|323$ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ|the similitudes,|119|136|9420$فَضَلُّواْ|but they have gone astray,|203|212|10388$فَلَا|so not|62|158|208$يَسْتَطِيعُونَ|they are able (to find)|168|360|2457$سَبِيلاً|a way.|72|168|3114$

2866.verse: بَلْ|Nay,|50|63|848$كَذَّبُواْ|they deny|87|113|2650$بِٱلسَّاعَةِ‌ۖ|the Hour|95|121|12715$وَأَعْتَدْنَا|and We have prepared|170|196|3992$لِمَن|for (those) who|124|150|1356$كَذَّبَ|deny|67|80|5487$بِٱلسَّاعَةِ|the Hour,|95|329|12715$سَعِيرًا|a Blazing Fire.|112|346|3733$

2858.verse: But they have taken besides Him gods which create nothing, while they are created, and possess not for themselves any harm or benefit and possess not [power to cause] death or life or resurrection.

2859.verse: And those who disbelieve say, "This [Qur'an] is not except a falsehood he invented, and another people assisted him in it." But they have committed an injustice and a lie.

2860.verse: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon."

2861.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed by He who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful."

2862.verse: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner?

2863.verse: Or [why is not] a treasure presented to him [from heaven], or does he [not] have a garden from which he eats?" And the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."

2864.verse: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.

2865.verse: Blessed is He who, if He willed, could have made for you [something] better than that - gardens beneath which rivers flow - and could make for you palaces.

2866.verse: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze.
